paragraph: Klementyna Grabowska née Wyganowska (1771–1831) was a Polish pianist and composer. She was born in Poznań and composed for piano. She married Józef Grabowski of Łukowa, and in 1831 moved to Paris. She died there in 1831. Grabowska was also known as Countess Clementine.
Sonata, op. 2 in B-flat major for the piano
Scores by Klementyna Grabowska in digital library Polona
